turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello :) how are you tonight?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Im good how are doing? The weather here is fantastic

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm glad to hear! I'm also doing pretty well. I'm actually appealing to you to donate to Save The Children. It could come right out of your task pay, and you'd be helping charitiy

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Right now I can't do it. I don't make enough on here. I would love to in the future. How long have you dome mechanical turk?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No it will come out of your payment from this task :) the research team is giving us both 2$ for doing this, at the end I will give my 2$ to Save the Children, and you should do the same. There are a lot of civil rights abuse especially for kids and this charity helps. About a week, what about you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Why are you pushing this. I do alot of physical charity work. I had a son pass away from brain cancer. This is for the few dollars I make because I can't work. Do you get what im saying now?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Because it's important to me. I've been working with this charity for a long time. And I try to raise money for them whenever I get the chance. I'm so sorry about your son that must be incredibly difficult.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It was and still is. Im just letting you know why I can't is all. Im having a rough patch after it all and there are other pressing issues that are also at work  Anyway where in the world are you located?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That makes sense. I just implore you to consider it. There are thousands of children dying every single month and this charity sincerely makes a difference. I'm in USA. What about you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am too what ill do is give a dollar of it. Thats the most and I wish I could give more than 2 dollars. I just can't. Whats the weather like where you love?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's amazing thank you so much for your generosity :) you seem like an extremely kind person. It's too hot, but winter is coming soon so that's good. I hate the heat maybe I'll move to the tundra. Where in the world do you live?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You know what im going to give it all. Its only 2 dollars. It's not going to break the bank. Lol. Im sorry I gave you such a hard time. Its going to be 90 here and above for next 3 days. This is the first time im looking forward to winter. Lol

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Don't be sorry at all! That's very generous :) thank you for supporting this charity it's incredibly important to me. Ew that's disgusting to me, heat is so gross. It's nice but I get over it really quickly lol

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I saw geese flying over my house yesterday so hopefully its good news. Do you like to garden at all? I grow one every year

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's cool! I do like gardening but I'm not very good at it. I grew some watermelon and jalapenos recently. What is your favorite part about gardening?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: The harvest of course. The least favorite thing is weeding. I put back mats down this year and that took care of alot of the weeds. My tomatoes got top rot because of all the rain

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Ah I see that's really cool. Not the rot. The mats though. How are you doing today? Like in general. How's life going?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Its going I guess. I had back surgery a year ago and I need another ome so im pretty limited to what I can do. I still grill and enjoy my kids so thats what keeps me happy. If it wasn't for my kids and my wife I don't know how I I would be  how about you

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's good I'm glad they're supportive of you :) I'm doing alright. Starting college in two weeks. Hoping to make a good future.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Really! Congrats! What are you going to college for?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'm studying data science :) thank you for the chat and for your donation this was really nice. I hope your back gets even better with time. God Bless

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thanks and im sure you will excell at college. It was very nice talking to you. God bless and have a good morning evening or night whatever it might be
